Matcher

'MapMatcher': a "dating site" that tries to connect people that want to go to the same destination. It will take in your preferences and criteria and match you with people whose criteria you match.

Description

A dating site that matches people by their preference of which place they want to travel to. People will state where they want to go and who they want to go with. Then, they get matched with people that want to go to that same area. Group project, mainly focused on collaboration via GitHub and how to make a login/register/edit-system.
